name: Heroes Of Drakemire
description:
Dive into Heroes of Drakemire, where classic turn-based, party-based combat reminiscent of old-school JRPGs is brought to life. Level up, master a multitude of skills, and journey across the realm in search of legendary equipment and secret techniques.



Meet the Heroes of Drakemire. They might appear unassuming, but when dragons soar, monsters rampage, and darkness looms, these unlikely champions step forward!



Embark with Brutus and his brave companions on an adventure that weaves through a world filled with quirky characters and captivating tales. Stand your ground against nefarious foes to safeguard your allies and the world itself.



Brace for challenges that test the bonds of family, friendship, and destiny. Explore a myriad of maps filled with adventure, from familiar towns to ancient places of power. The fate of the world teeters on the edge—but take heart, heroes. Even amidst the chaos, there's always time to help those in need along the way, and there’s definitely time for pie!

Heroes of Drakemire features:
  • 6 heroes to join your party
  • 80+ quests across 50+ maps
  • 50 unique monsters
  • Turn-based combat with dozens of skills and spells to train and upgrade
